name: Another Dimension - Sci-Fi Platformer (Early Alpha)
description:
Hello Everyone,

 I am new to the Itch.io community and wanted to make my first contribution by putting out a 1 level prototype of a sci-fi adventure platformer called "Another Dimension."

It features music from https://davidkbd.itch.io/

Pictures bought from Adobe Stock (backgrounds)

& the green portal assets are from https://elthen.itch.io/

All else are assets from GDevelop.

I first-off want to thank the people who's work contributed to my project. Second, I want to invite you all to playtest the first level.

It is meant to be an easy level because it's Level 1 but eventually as the story progresses, (yes, there is a story), the levels will get more complex and difficult.

You will also make decisions that will influence your gameplay. 

This is set in the future when Earth is dying from overpopulation and exhausted resources. The main character Mac is a space explorer that must find alternative worlds that could be habitable, as well as supplies for his fellow humans. 

You can use "E" key for destroying an enemy, I am working on better mechanics for the fighting system right now.

Use right and left arrow keys to move, and Spacebar to jump. 

Be sure to click the sound button in the corners so you can hear the awesome music by David KBD!

If you enjoy the short demo, please leave me some feedback and consider a small donation as 10% of funds I get for my games will go towards supporting research for Huntington's Disease (to the HDSA). I have the disease myself and have lost a lot of family members from it. 

Thank you so much!!
